bioghist.p: Samuel Moyerman (1893-1966) was the owner of the Philadelphia Autograph Company.

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of correspondence, licenses, and receipts, from various insurance companies in Philadelphia and the Mid-Atlantic region. Philadelphia Health Insurance Company records (1848-1849) include correspondence to W. F. Boone from agents and clients, mostly concerning agencies, policies, and applications for policies. Delaware Mutual Safety Insurance Company records (1848-1853) include business correspondence of W. Betz. National Security Company records (1924-1931) include city licenses to practice insurance. Fame Insurance Company records (1872-1892) consist of receipts. Philadelphia Fire & Marine Co. records (1927-1929) consist of city licenses to practice insurance.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

relatedmaterial.p: Related material may be found in the following collections: University of Delaware: Williams family papers (1778-1877) (Fame Insurance Company receipt book).
